name: Meow (pixelken)
description:
[Mature Content]

This is an innocent game about guilt, regret, and development. No minors, please.

I discovered Bitsy today, and in under three hours of tinkering, I have made a game. This storyline is honestly unexpected, I just... explored.

I hope you enjoy this as much as I did creating it. :)

[Controls]

WASD or arrow keys. Bump into characters or objects to interact. Space to continue dialogue.
